channel.title: Posts on George Vlahavas
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on George Vlahavas

item.title: Using Hugo with Github Pages
item.description: So, I decided to start using Hugo as the platform for my website/blog. I’ve looked into different options, including Jekyll and Hexo and in the end, Hugo is the one that made the most sense to me. I also wanted to use Github Pages with it, including using a custom domain and using HTTPS by default. Had I chosen Jekyll, integration with Github Pages would have been automatic. However, Github Pages do not directly support any other static website generator.

item.title: The Linux Command Line Seminars @ GreekLUG
item.description: This is a series of seminars I presented at GreekLUG, about the use of the Linux Command Line. It’s in Greek. Total length is almost 9 hours… Youtube Playlist (in Greek)

item.title: Salix Presentation @ GreekLUG
item.description: This is a presentation of Salix, the GNU/Linux distribution I am developing. The presentation was make in GreekLUG, Thessaloniki, Greece, so it is in Greek. It’s quite a lengthy one I must admit. Youtube Video (in Greek) Slides
